package.name: com.eqsim.components
package.shortDescription: The <b>components package</b> contains the equipment interface component classes.
package.description: The classes in this package contain common equipment interface components, such as buttons, knobs, gauges, sliders, etc. In our AS2 version, we also implemented a keypad, a digital bar, a joystick, and an event recorder/playback mechanism. Please contact us if you need any of those components, and we can discuss adding them to this set.

package.name: com.eqsim.events
package.shortDescription: The <b>events package</b> contains common custom Events.
package.description: This package contains custom Events that are used across the com.eqsim libraries.

package.name: com.eqsim.FStEng
package.shortDescription: The <b>FStEng package</b> contains the hierarchical state engine classes.
package.description: This package contains the classes for implementing finite-state machines and hierarchical state machines. For more information about the state engine, please see our AS1, AS2, and AS3 releases at http://code.google.com/p/flash-state-engine/. The code in this package duplicates the former code, but puts in in the com.eqsim package, instead of com.flashsim.
